# The `MachineFunctionInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> - This class can be derived from and used by targets to hold private target-specific information for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::MachineFunctionInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> - This class can be derived from and used by targets to hold private target-specific information for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>.

Objects of type are accessed/created with MF::getInfo and destroyed when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> is destroyed.

Definition at line 104 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### clone() {#a83e7607428ae730737085ad37ffd6365}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual MachineFunctionInfo &#42; llvm::MachineFunctionInfo::clone (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; DestMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Src2DstMBB) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Make a functionally equivalent copy of this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> in <code>MF</code>.

This requires remapping <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> references from the original parent to values in the new function. Targets may assume that virtual register and frame index values are preserved in the new function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### create() {#a06ad8b2e5a8e3c0f81f05c7870fb3b23}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename FuncInfoTy, typename SubtargetTy = TargetSubtargetInfo&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static FuncInfoTy &#42; llvm::MachineFunctionInfo::create (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> SubtargetTy &#42; STI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Factory function: default behavior is to call new using the supplied allocator.

This function can be overridden in a derive class.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h/#l00112">112</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.
